Reviews.Title: “nice little place in a convenient area”

Reviews.Content: returned venice freezing read lot reviews little hotel bad nasty please dont reviews fairly cheap hotel position paid free computer internet bonus found helpful single overlooking quiet canal except delivery arrived 800am fine lying bed day days venice change cars bikes etc whizzing passed hotel liken guest houses personal hotels wish warm sit little balcony overlooking canal dream single own little balcony yes liked cosiness breakfast adequate juice hot chocolate slices crusty bread croissant packets toasted biscuits packets sweet biscuits pineapple peaches lots cheese triangles dont eat cereal yogurts found review lady helpful honest helpful lost night couple walked hotel left rialto instead brought minutes instead half hour little shop round corner handy buying water wine little cafe opposite ran chinese people accommodating hot chocolate home walking venice day 1000am slow train half hours â£7 verona lovely paid extra â£20 express train compromise worth visit bought return airport venice ticket 1st 5th day 3day vaporetta ticket middle 3 days visit murano island burano visited academia fantastic particularly windy cold day guggenheim annoying people walk information device loud speaker bad comment attitude boarding staff marco polo airport especially stupidly reflection spent â£20 3 pizza cutters hand luggage

Reviews.Title: “nice place for a nice price”
Reviews.Author: pinnychan
Reviews.Content: hotel placed calle romantic venetian housethe smallvery bathroom okbut 1 night breakfast little roomjust eat enogh extra coffee pay highly reccomend hotel romantic weekend venice

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”

Reviews.Content: id read people arrived bumped hotel emailed ahead time told id heard wouldnt indeed fine lobby sent hotel location convenient san marco arranged free water taxi murano glass factory expected sales pressure none breakfast nice

Reviews.Title: “Very very disappointing”
Reviews.Author: mang0jam
Reviews.Content: hard writing review basically decided hotel write review final comment decision arrived venice tried hotel map hotels website terribly lost looked map map terrible wrong walking twenty minutes loads people eventually found hotel wasnt hotel met empty reception holler stairs met extremly flustered told wrong start booking mixed wasnt couple reviewers journey annex hotel extremly hotel interestingly st marco pay nearer lug luggage narrow stairs carpet tread short filthy carpet tread health safety inspector kittens junior suite basically double bed corner son lost temper conned location conned bathroom tiny pink plastic soap stands theme running reviews book hotel wary move people apparent reason junior suite poster bed basically curtain material held velcro shown balcony sit oh sit cushions ripped thanks windows net curtain window frame nearly fell head breakfast reason writing review toilet answer resounding price star star horrible nasty hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: atwied
Reviews.Content: despite written instructions map difficult hotel venice maze tiny alleyways luggage tow little frustrating found gem decorated venetian style added charm read previous reviews bathroomshower wrong apt description shower stall jacuzzi shower unit lack size breakfast nice friendly attentive lady serves heat croissants bring coffee jr suite definitely bit misleading double bed single bed wall cot folded middle available floor space beds comfortable ac fine location centre town happy stay

Reviews.Title: “Charming little hotel with a great location!”
Reviews.Author: Alberica
Reviews.Content: stayed locanda canal 5 days january 2010 location perfect youre st marks square 5 minutes walking hotel pretty 6 floor seat lift stairs challenging original medieval venecian style simple beautiful clean staff friendly helpful
